about.summary: Tools and utilities for dealing with parse data. Parse data represents the parse tree as data with location and type information.  This package provides functions for navigating the parse tree as a data frame.

Tools and utilities for dealing with parse data. Parse data represents the parse tree as data with location and type information.  This package provides functions for navigating the parse tree as a data frame.

name: r-parsetools
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.3' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-parsetools
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/parsetools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/parsetools/parsetools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5f17b15a84fd619d4eccee79999b21170c8b6488a5a1208419e381c4556328b4

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('parsetools')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('parsetools')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/RDocTaskForce/parsetools
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Tools and utilities for dealing with parse data. Parse data represents the parse tree
    as data with location and type information.  This package provides functions for
    navigating the parse tree as a data frame.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: parsetools
